content.rendered: 720P non-realtime, H.265//H.264 video compression. 1 HDMI/1 VGA, 8ch Video in, 1 Audio in/1 Audio out,1 RJ45(100M),2 USB, ,Penta-brid(CVBS/HDCVI/AHD/TVI/IP self-adaptive, 8+2 IP camera input, up to 6Mp)
